{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMC7004WFW |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/01/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |manuf_model=WG3004-17 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=HEDACC7004WFW |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Conexant |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F160C3BA90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IS42S16400-7T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Wistron NeWeb EP2 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Harris |wi1_chip1_model=HFA3841;HFA3841CN, 0049S 4458440, LUC 1257H; |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3861B |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Kendin |eth_chip2_model=KS8737 |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E8050;88E8050-RJJ, T08635.1, 0123 ATP; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=SuperTask!; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Barricade Plus Wireless Firewall Router}}
"MADE IN TAIWAN R. O.C." and "P/N: 142004-404 REV: 01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :"48.EP201.00A" and "WS80100C 01/13" is silkscreened on the '''Acer''' / '''Wistron NeWeb''' wireless module.
Per the [http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/ '''HRI'''], this device is using '''Supertask''' as its OS.
Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC sample manual.
The power supply shown in the FCC external photos is a '''DVE''' DV-91MX (120VAC ~ 60Hz -> 9VDC, 1.0A).
